FILE: cm385630v11.0.txt
DYAD: NORWAY - IRAN
RIVALRY: RIV1042
DISPUTE(S): MID2832 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180531
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180809


Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables


MID2832 

TERRMID: MID2832 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2832 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2832 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2832 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2832 from Gibler 2018, Iran attacked numerous Norwegian ships that were trading with Iraq. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial dispute in which Iran and Iraq regulary attacked ships trading with the other country. 

MARITMID: MID2832 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2832 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2832 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2832 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2832 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2832 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2832 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2832 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2832 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2832 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2832 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2832 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 



RIVNOTES:
